title: A Pet for Tommy
features: Tommy wants a pet. At the zoo, he meets lots of animals. He is sure that he will get to bring one home with him. Which one should he choose?
description: Jennifer Royal lives in Missouri with her husband and two sweet parakeets. She wishes there was enough space for a llama in their back yard.
